definitions.text: a commercial document showing that the holder is entitled to something (as to ride on public transportation or to enter a public entertainment)
a label written or printed on paper, cardboard, or plastic that is attached to something to indicate its owner, nature, price, etc.
a summons issued to an offender (especially to someone who violates a traffic regulation)
a list of candidates nominated by a political party to run for election to public offices

examples: this car could be just the ticket for a small family

definitions.text: issue a ticket or a fine to as a penalty
examples: I was fined for parking on the wrong side of the street
Move your car or else you will be ticketed!

definitions.text: provide with a ticket for passage or admission
